mission_skip-20000001: Obtaining Operation Grade special support services will unlock the <color=#333333FF>Equipment and Fairy</color> systems.
mission_skip-20000002: Obtaining Planning Grade special support services will unlock the <color=#333333FF>Protocol Assimilation and Fire Support</color> systems.
mission_skip-20000003: Obtaining Strategic Grade special support services will unlock the <color=#333333FF>Gray Zone Exploration and Mobile Armor</color> systems.
